blockquote.p: Any FHIR capability may be 'allowed' by the system unless explicitly marked as 'SHALL NOT'. A few items are marked as MAY in the Implementation Guide to highlight their potential relevance to the use case.

div.p: 用戶端建議應該（SHOULD）使用伺服端能力聲明中的查詢參數，支援讀取和查詢一個或多個 Profile。系統互動能力：可能可以（MAY）支援交易（transaction）、批次（batch）與查詢系統（search-system）。
The summary table lists the resources that are part of this configuration, and for each resource it lists:

ul.li: The interactions supported by each resource (Read, Search, Update, and Create, are always shown, while VRead, Patch, Delete, History on Instance, or History on Type are only present if at least one of the resources has support for them.

li.span: The required, recommended, and some optional search parameters (if any).

ul.li: The operations on the resource (if any)

b.title: GET all set of resources of the type (search interaction)
PUT a new resource version (update interaction)

tr.td: _id, clinical-status, code, subject, onset-date, abatement-date, severity
_id, class, date, identifier, location, subject, status
code, identifier, medication, patient, status, context, device, effective-time, performer, reason-given, reason-not-given, request, subject
_id, category, code, date, performer, status, subject, patient, _lastUpdated

ul.li: SHOULD support read, search-type, create, update.

div.p: 用戶端應支援 $extract 操作以： • 將已完成的問卷回應轉換為結構化 FHIR 資源 • 支援 Observation 提取（計分、測量） • 支援資源 Bundle 提取（複雜資料模型） • 自動計算衍生欄位（如得分）
這是 SDC 工作流的關鍵步驟

description.value: 此 CapabilityStatement 定義了用戶端（Client）應支援的 FHIR RESTful API 功能。用戶端建議應該（SHOULD）使用伺服端能力聲明中的查詢參數，支援讀取和查詢一個或多個 FHIR Profile。

documentation.value: 用戶端建議應該（SHOULD）使用伺服端能力聲明中的查詢參數，支援讀取和查詢一個或多個 Profile。系統互動能力：可能可以（MAY）支援交易（transaction）、批次（batch）與查詢系統（search-system）。
